Austin Schwarm

I make things do things, on your computer and on the web.

Hi, I'm a full-stack software engineer based in Hartford, CT specializing in the design & development of web applications.

Professionally, I have experience delivering high-quality enterprise web apps for use on desktops or mobile devices. When I'm not working, I like to explore other software development domains as well, such as desktop applications and embedded systems.
